title: Swarna Valli: Emerald, Coral, and Diamond Pendant
materials: and Sparkling White CZ Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish finish for lasting shine.
features: This pendant features a graceful crescent shape meticulously crafted from 22K gold. Delicate filigree work inspired by traditional Telugu floral motifs adorns the piece, interspersed with dazzling CZ diamonds. A central vibrant green Emerald provides a focal point, complemented by a suspended round Coral drop. The openwork design enhances the pendant's lightness and intricate detail. Can be worn as a pendant or as a Vaddanam centerpiece
colors: and Sparkling White (Diamonds). A classic and auspicious South Indian color palette.
occasions: and festive occasions. Also a stylish and elegant addition to any modern outfit. Perfect for Seemantham (baby shower) or a half-saree function.
description: This pendant is a beautiful blend of traditional South Indian design and modern elegance. The combination of Emerald, Coral, and Diamonds is considered highly auspicious. The craftsmanship is impeccable, ensuring a piece that will be treasured for generations. Handcrafted in Hyderabad.
